Title: Icon Pro
Description:
Icon Pro is a free and open source tool for icon manipulation.
It can extract, open an create Windows Icon Files (.ico).
HomeWiki:
ICON PRO

MOVED TO GITHUB:

 GitHub - HerbertLausmann/HL.IconPro

What is Icon Pro?

Icon Pro is a free, open-source software for Windows Icon files manipulation. It allows you to create, open, and extract icon files easy.

Principal features

  • Open an icon file and extract it frames;
  • Create a complete and high quality icon file from a PNG Image;
  • Extract icon files from Windows Executable's (*.dll, *.exe);

Development

  • Windows Presentation Foundation for the User Interface.
  • C# for code behind.
  • .Net Framework 4.5 and Visual Studio 2013 for overall development.
